page_title: Palanca Safari & Travel - Explore Angola & Beyond with Tailor-Made Tours
meta_description: Palanca Safari & Travel offers unforgettable safaris, beach holidays, and adventure tours in Angola and across the globe. Book your personalized travel experience today.
twitter_description: Explore Angola and beyond with custom safaris, beach getaways, and unforgettable travel experiences.
schema_description: Tour and Travel company offering safaris, beach holidays, and scenic adventures across Angola and Africa
hero_h1_1: Explore Angola & Beyond - Tailor-Made Adventures, Unforgettable Moments
hero_p_1: Safaris, Beach Holidays, and Scenic Escapes Crafted with Passion
hero_h1_2: Fly with TAAG to Kenya - Special Discounts!
hero_p_2: Hurry and book your ticket until December 20th.
welcome_text: At Palanca Safari & Travel, we create journeys inspired by passion - for people, wildlife, and the breathtaking landscapes of Angola and the world. Whether you're craving a beach holiday, thrilling safari, or mountain adventure, we're here to make your dream trip come true.
usp_1_p: Tailor-made holidays designed around your preferences.
usp_2_p: Knowledgeable guides who know Angola's hidden gems.
usp_3_p: Supporting conservation efforts and sustainable tourism.
usp_4_p: Hassle-free transfers for all international packages.
usp_5_p: Always available to assist with any questions or concerns.
usp_6_p: Dedicated to showcasing Angola's natural beauty and heritage.
testimonials_title: What Our Happy Travelers Are Saying

opt_cpt_1: Cape Town: Onomo Hotel Inn On The Square (4 Star) - $1,370
opt_cpt_3: Cape Town: Sun Square Gardens (3 Star) - $1,525
opt_sao_3: São Tomé: Miramar By Pestana (4 Star) - $1,795
package_jhb_1_desc: Explore vibrant Johannesburg with a 6-night stay at this 3-star hotel. Includes flights, breakfast, and transfers.
package_jhb_2_desc: Discover South Africa's largest city with a 6-night stay at this 4-star all-suite hotel. Package includes all essentials.
package_cpt_1_desc: Experience beautiful Cape Town with a 6-night stay at this 4-star hotel. Includes flights, breakfast, and transfers.
package_cpt_2_desc: Enjoy a 6-night getaway in stunning Cape Town at this 3-star hotel, complete with all travel essentials.
package_sao_1_desc: Escape to the paradise of São Tomé for 6 nights at this cozy 3-star hotel. Includes flights, breakfast, and transfers.
package_sao_2_desc: Indulge in a 4-star, 6-night experience in tropical São Tomé. Your perfect island getaway awaits, all inclusive.
ready_cta_title: Ready to Plan Your Next Adventure?
ready_cta_p: Whether you are dreaming of a beach escape, a thrilling safari, or a scenic tour through Angola's hidden gems, we are here to make it happen. Contact us today and lets start planning your unforgettable journey.
apg_p: Palanca Safari is proud to be certified by the Air Promotion Group (APG). This certification assures that our safari guides meet the highest professional standards in guiding, safety, and wildlife knowledge, providing you with an unparalleled safari experience.
footer_p: At Palanca Safari & Travel, we create journeys inspired by passion - for people, wildlife, and the breathtaking landscapes of Angola and the world. Whether you're craving a beach holiday, thrilling safari, or mountain adventure, we're here to make your dream trip come true.
copyright: Palanca Safari & Travel. All Rights Reserved.
story_p1: Welcome to Palanca Safari & Travel, where adventure meets passion. Founded in 2024 and proudly based in Angola, we are more than just a travel company; we are storytellers, experience-makers, and proud ambassadors of Africa's breathtaking beauty.
story_p2: Born out of deep love for wildlife, culture, and the raw landscapes of Angola and beyond, Palanca Safari & Travel was created to offer travellers something truly special: tailor-made journeys that leave lasting memories.
mission_p: To deliver authentic, unforgettable travel experiences that celebrate the beauty of Angola, Africa and the world; while promoting environmental conservation, cultural appreciation, and personalized service.
diff_1_p: Every trip is carefully tailored to your preference
diff_2_p: Our team knows the hidden gems, best routes, and insider tips to give you a deeper, richer experience
diff_3_p: We give you top-notch service and unforgettable adventures; all while staying within your budget
diff_4_p: We are passionate about our guests, passionate about wildlife, and passionate about showcasing the best of Angola
cta_about_title: Join Us on an Unforgettable Journey
cta_about_p: Whether you are a first-time explorer or a seasoned traveller, we're here to make your dream trip a reality. From the savannahs of Angola to the beaches of Zanzibar, let's create something amazing together
contact_page_title: Contact Us Directly | Palanca Safari & Travel
contact_h1: Is a pleasure to hear from you
services_hero_p: Experience the world with our comprehensive range of travel services designed to create unforgettable journeys tailored to your unique preferences.
services_list_p: Our team of experienced travel specialists is dedicated to creating personalized travel experiences that exceed your expectations. Discover our range of services below.
serv_card_1_p: Our expert travel consultants work one-on-one with you to create custom itineraries tailored to your preferences, budget, and travel style.
serv_card_1_li_1: Initial consultation to understand your travel goals
serv_card_2_p: Indulge in extraordinary experiences with our premium travel services. Our luxury vacation packages include exclusive accommodations, private transfers, and VIP access.
serv_card_list_private_guides: Private guided tours with local experts
serv_card_list_dining: Exclusive dining reservations at renowned restaurants
serv_card_list_charters: Helicopter transfers and private yacht charters
serv_card_list_vip: VIP airport services and priority check-in
serv_card_3_p: Push your boundaries and create lasting memories with our adventure travel packages. From adrenaline-pumping activities to off-the-beaten-path destinations.
serv_card_list_scuba: Scuba diving in pristine coral reefs
serv_card_4_p: Create precious family memories with our specially designed family vacation packages. We take care of all the details so you can focus on enjoying quality time.
serv_card_list_meal_options: Convenient meal options for picky eaters
serv_card_5_p: Celebrate your love story with our romantic getaways designed specifically for couples. From secluded beach retreats to enchanting city escapes.
serv_card_list_photography: Photography sessions to capture your special moments
serv_card_6_p: Whether planning a corporate retreat, family reunion, or friend getaway, our group travel specialists ensure seamless coordination for all participants.
serv_card_7_p: Explore the world's most beautiful coastlines and waterways with our curated cruise packages. From luxury ocean liners to intimate river cruises.
serv_card_8_p: Turn your dream wedding into reality with our destination wedding planning services. We coordinate all aspects of your special day in breathtaking locations.
serv_card_list_travel_logistics: Travel logistics for wedding party and guests
serv_card_9_p: Our corporate travel services provide efficient and cost-effective solutions for business travelers. We ensure smooth operations while adhering to your company's policies.
book_process_p: We've simplified our booking process to make planning your dream journey as seamless as possible.
step_1_p: Schedule a free consultation with one of our travel experts through our online form, by phone, or via video call.
step_2_p: Based on your preferences and requirements, we'll create a detailed travel proposal including itinerary and pricing options.
step_3_p: We'll refine the proposal based on your feedback until it perfectly matches your vision.
step_4_p: Once you're satisfied with the plan, we'll confirm all reservations and provide you with detailed travel documents.
step_5_p: Throughout your journey, our team remains available to assist with any questions or unexpected situations.
dest_page_title: Palanca Safari & Travel - Explore Angola & Beyond
dest_hero_p: Explore handpicked destinations around the world and create memories that last a lifetime
dest_cta_p: Contact us to start arranging your dream destination today.
